clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Avapritinib is indicated for the treatment of unresectable metastatic gastrointestinal stromal tumors with a platelet derived growth factor receptor alpha exon 18 mutation A189339 L11136

contraindications.disease: Data regarding overdoses of avapritinib are not readily available L11136
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Avapritinib is a selective kinase inhibitor that negatively modulates the action of cell transporters to resensitize them to other chemotherapies L11136 It has a long duration of action as it is given once daily L11136 Patients should be counselled regarding the risk of intracranial hemorrhage CNS effects and embryo fetal toxicity L11136
